generator Class Reference

Public Attributes

int count
 the total number of robots that will be generated.

flyMesh* objmesh
 the generator's mesh.

flyMesh* anim_mesh
 an animated mesh that is activated when a robot is generated.

particle_system* anim_ps
 a particle emmiter that is activated when a robot is generated.

int animtime
 the amount of time that the generation animation plays.

float anim_size
 size of the animating object.

flyArray<flyBspObject*> gen_types
 enumeration of the types of robots that the generator can activate.

int gen_delay
 the amount of time between two robot activations.

float gen_angle
 the random angle in which robots are generated.

sound* gen_sound
 sound for activating a new robot.

flyVector birthpos
 relative position on which the generated robots will show up.

flyArray<flyBspObject *> objs
 an array of objects that are signaled when all the robots activated by the generator are killed.

Detailed Description

Robot generator class.

This class implements a generator that periodically adds robots to the game.
